# Documentation Index

This directory contains GitHub-specific files and workflows.

## Main Documentation

All user-facing documentation is in the root directory:

- **[README.md](../README.md)** - Main project documentation, features, and quick start
- **[CHANGELOG.md](../CHANGELOG.md)** - Version history and release notes
- **[CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)** - Contribution guidelines
- **[TESTING.md](../TESTING.md)** - Test coverage and testing procedures
- **[TUI_FEATURES.md](../TUI_FEATURES.md)** - Detailed TUI documentation
- **[FILTER_RATIONALE.md](../FILTER_RATIONALE.md)** - Design decision for 1 MB filter
- **[TEMP_DIRECTORIES.md](../TEMP_DIRECTORIES.md)** - Complete list of detected patterns

## For Contributors

If you're looking to contribute:

1. Read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) for guidelines
2. Check [TESTING.md](../TESTING.md) for test requirements
3. Review [CHANGELOG.md](../CHANGELOG.md) to understand recent changes

## For Users

If you're using the tool:

1. Start with [README.md](../README.md) for installation and usage
2. Check [TUI_FEATURES.md](../TUI_FEATURES.md) for interactive mode details
3. See [TEMP_DIRECTORIES.md](../TEMP_DIRECTORIES.md) for what gets detected
